column4: i want to add a shortcut to my "Downloads" folder on my desktop, whats the easiest way to do it? (find symlinks rather complicated)
i guess... open it with nautilus (the folder thingy), and drag it onto the desktop... does that work?
dont think so, i use Thunar file manager (xfces)
try #xubuntu, maybe they can help you better :) (at least i do not know)
